oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Volunteers assist with a water rescue in Bellevue during the May 2010 flood
oai_dc:dc.dc:description:
A photograph of volunteers assisting with a rescue in Bellevue during the May 2010 Nashville flood. Photo text reads: “Volunteers came from 5-10 mi away. I recognize only 2 or 3 neighbors in this photo. Lord knows where the boat came from. We never saw any of these folks again and still don’t know who they are or where they came from.”
Forms part of the Nashville Room Flood 2010 Digital History Project.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Nashville (Tenn.)--Floods;Nashville (Tenn.)--History--21st century;Bellevue (Tenn.);Nashville (Tenn.)--History--Sources
